snippet: Philippine senators abruptly ended a hearing on Monday into allegations by a retired policeman that a "death squad" operated under President Rodrigo Duterte when he was mayor of Davao City, citing no proof that it even existed....

headline.main: Citing Lack of Proof, Philippine Senators End Duterte 'Death Squad' Inquiry
headline.print_headline: Citing Lack of Proof, Philippine Senators End Duterte 'Death Squad' Inquiry

lead_paragraph: Philippine senators abruptly ended a hearing on Monday into allegations by a retired policeman that a "death squad" operated under President Rodrigo Duterte when he was mayor of Davao City, citing no proof that it even existed.
